body:
Hello!

I haven't been online for a while now and won't be again due to not being able to log in anymore. I don't care why I can't either, as I lived myself away from the game a bit. I do play the game for five years, including three(?) years on avicus. However, I wasn't that involved in the servers' community etc. as there were many more Servers I liked to play on(That's why I don't have too much online time). Maybe I will be online someday again, but until then, I want you to have a great time =)
